tile.name: collapsed Skyscraper
tile.description: Many people worked here before the world fell apart. You ought to find out what caused this destruction at some point.

tile.name: Home
tile.description: You hear the constant strings of rain pattering on your apartments roof, while small leds illumante this hollow room.

tile.name: Market
tile.description: As you enter the market you perceive a variety of sounds. This area seems busy and maybe you are able to trade as well.

tile.name: Locker
tile.description: A tremendous bank vault secured by space marines indicating that its probably best to avoid going there. Maybe later.

tile.name: Metro
tile.description: Rapid trains once passed these rails, now its just dust and junk paving a way trough the depths of this tunnel.

tile.name: Lobby
tile.description: You enter the halls filled with a diversity of scents indicating that a lot of ppl come here and talk with each other.

tile.name: Restaurant
tile.description: In this distopian times a place to relax and nourish thyself next to well laid plates is fairly welcomed. Enjoy.

tile.name: Nuclear power plant
tile.description: Great Scientists once maintained this enormous accomplishment that delivered power to the whole city and further.

tile.name: Grammar School
tile.description: Once visited by many teenagers and kids this school now represents the fallen Importance of education in this world.

tile.name: freeway
tile.description: You find yourself next to a massive concrete construction. Previously used as route it now solely exists.

tile.name: Field
tile.description: Potatoes were harvested here once. After the mysterious war there is nothing left but burning divots and scrap.

tile.name: refuge
tile.description: Back when it was peaceful, wayfarer often came here to rest. You once heard that dangerous monster live there now.

tile.name: freeway
tile.description: You find yourself next to a massive concrete construction. Previously used as route it now solely exists.

tile.name: radio tower
tile.description: During the disastrous event nuclear weapons dismantled many buildings including this collapsed building.

tile.name: Field
tile.description: Potatoes were harvested here once. After the mysterious war there is nothing left but burning divots and scrap.

tile.name: tree formation
tile.description: Altough this forest is glaring with thousand of tree, these trees remind you of rituals, some sort of formation.

tile.name: glade
tile.description: Rays of sunlight pierce trough the lush trees. Among the dominant silence you hear birds and wood crackling.

tile.name: cave
tile.description: A dead soldier lies in this dusky cave. He must have seeked shelter here, died however. Probable death: bloodloss.

tile.name: crashed plane
tile.description: Palls of smoke cover this area. There must have crashed a massive plane here once. Once again, remains of the war. #######################################################################################################################
